name: Siege Worlds
storyline: Join up to 4 players and fight as a team to prevent an attack by hordes of undead and monsters. Connect your DiviGo wallet to earn Divi rewards, can you make it to the end of the wave alive? Battle as historical characters, or build your own. With many options to chose from, every squad is unique. Build your character, assemble your squad, and repel the hordes.
